page.title: 14BERGHOLT-THE LAST 60 YEARS
page.content: {A LIFETIME (CONTD) AFTER THE WAR THE VILLAGE GRADUALLY EXPANDED.PEOPLE BECAME CAR OWNERS AND WERE ABLE TO TRAVEL FURTHER TO WORK SO LARGE HOUSING ESTATES WERE BUILT FOR HOME OWNERSHIP,THE "INCOMERS" BEGAN TO ARRIVE WITH FRESH IDEAS. 1985 THE CHURCHES AND THE SCHOOL ARE FLOURISHING AND REMAIN THE FOCAL POINTS.SOCIAL ACTIVITIES ARE AVAILABLE FOR ALL AGE GROUPS-THE VILLAGE IS ALIVE AND PROSPEROUS. WHILST WE REJOICE IN THE BETTER STANDARDS THAT "CHANGE" HAS BROUGHT US WE MUST BE EVER MINDFUL THAT SO CALLED PROGRESS WILL NOT MEAN URBANIZATION.
